壓.definition: used in 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4gen1r5]; used in 壓馬路|压马路[ya4ma3lu4]; used in 壓板|压板[ya4ban3]

壓伏.definition: variant of 壓服|压服[ya1 fu2]

壓住.definition: to press down; to crush down; to restrain (anger); to keep down (voice)

壓克力.definition: acrylic (loanword); see also 亞克力|亚克力[ya4 ke4 li4]

壓制.definition: to suppress; to inhibit; to stifle

壓力山大.definition: (jocular) to be under great pressure (a pun on 亞歷山大|亚历山大[Ya4 li4 shan1 da4])

壓垮.definition: to cause sth to collapse under the weight; (fig.) to overwhelm

壓場.definition: to hold the attention of an audience; to serve as the finale to a show

壓寶.definition: variant of 押寶|押宝[ya1 bao3]

壓抑.definition: to constrain or repress emotions; oppressive; stifling; depressing; repression

壓服.definition: to compel sb to obey; to force into submission; to subjugate

壓根.definition: (mainly used in the negative) in the first place; absolutely; simply

壓根兒.definition: erhua variant of 壓根|压根[ya4 gen1]

壓榨.definition: to press; to squeeze; to extract juice, oil etc by squeezing

壓歲錢.definition: money given to children as a gift on Chinese New Year's Eve

壓死駱駝的最後一根稻草.pinyin: ya1 si3 luo4 tuo5 de5 zui4 hou4 yi1 gen1 dao4 cao3
壓死駱駝的最後一根稻草.definition: the straw that broke the camel’s back (idiom); the final straw

壓痛.definition: (medicine) tenderness; pain experienced when touched or palpated

壓線.definition: pressure crease; fig. to toil for sb else's benefit; line ball (i.e. on the line)

壓臺戲.definition: last item on a show; grand finale

壓車.definition: variant of 押車|押车[ya1 che1]

壓軸好戲.definition: see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]

壓軸戲.definition: next-to-last item on a program (theater); climax

壓迫.definition: to oppress; to repress; to constrict; oppression; stress (physics)

壓陣.definition: to bring up the rear; to provide support; to hold the lines

壓韻.definition: variant of 押韻|押韵[ya1 yun4]

壓馬路.definition: variant of 軋馬路|轧马路[ya4 ma3 lu4]; Taiwan pr. [ya1 ma3 lu4]
